topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548600d56368727e81e50100#post_548600d56368727e81e50100
I don't mind those things either, but what really gets me is when a writer uses them excessively. At some point, things just get too dark for you to care. I believe TVTropes's term for it is ""Darkness Induced Audience Apathy":http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/DarknessInducedAudienceApathy."
